titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis T410: Charter, England

notesStmt.note: Admission to the manor of Anthony Drute by the Court Baron of Baron John Monson and Thomas Bennett, with Richard Levermore as deputy, in Bradford, Wiltshire, July 4, 1729. Signed by Monson and Bennett.

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts
